text: Henryk Jerzy Chmielewski (7 June 1923 – 22 January 2021), also known under his pseudonym Papcio Chmiel, was a Polish comic book artist and journalist. He started working as a graphic artist in the Świat Młodych magazine, where he also published comics. He was known for creating the Tytus, Romek i A'Tomek comic book series, which began in 1966. Chmielewski died on 22 January 2021 in Warsaw, aged 97. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish artists Category:Polish journalists Category:Comics artists Category:Writers from Warsaw
title: Henryk Chmielewski (comics)
